feed.title: Git-Sync Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.4.0
entry.content:
‚ùó BREAKING CHANGE

This release introduces a breaking change by including two new options in the config file: - platform - This option will help us in adding new platforms to the project. Currently, it only supports github. But the key needs to be present, otherwise the CLI will not work. - server - This is for mentioning the server domain and protocol.

The Wiki have been updated accordingly as well, so it is advised to update your local config files before updating to this release.

Changelog

  • 486ac5e545008a77ad0bacd0f8b0ab8a66861fd9 chore: :truck: leverage interfaces to structure the code
  • 74435bdb0984569da6a03acc54d0cf6d29ccdc4b feat!: :sparkles: platform key added in config with scope of extending to different platforms like GitLab and Bitbucket
  • 7c4e0eec4a61b4a42b64e7f4a51ad95c6792bc7e fix: :bug: repoURL format fixed

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.4.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • b1185e34012726f6e3bb5907777abcf67751a779 chore: :memo: update Docker run command to include the --rm flag
  • 24549f159ac9f248e42126071ff63d0a2b1cefe9 chore: :truck: move validating config into separate function
  • 1c1ee3dc753248115b3c535166b057d13cff4a14 chore: :wrench: update config to include organization filters and platform/server settings
  • 78b6dfbdfe04f097e1e8206aae3dc9cc9cfb76d9 fix: :bug: if backup-dir is passed from cli flags then use that instead of the one in config file

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.5.0
entry.content:
GitLab Support

This release adds support for backing up repositories from GitLab.

Changelog

  • 39975a5f89d0f00dea3cef3b94de82010a511eec chore: :wrench: add renovate.json
  • 29948395da3ecd70e26725614974cab166d70a7b feat: :sparkles: support for Gitlab added

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.5.1
entry.content:
Changelog

  • a65dc828d7c10b664c84522acaa730b2f0fb0dfd chore: :truck: simplify include and exclude in list functions
  • 5af2c3324cf8d6afb317cee4135b5112f29c4f90 chore: :wrench: update link to wiki page for no token
  • 8b81007ef19271385014a170be6a57973ab674f0 feat: :sparkles: fork checking added for gitlab

entry.title: New release for Git-Sync: v0.6.0
entry.content:
Bitbucker Support

git-sync now support backing up repositories from Bitbucket as well! üéâ

Changelog

  • d187441c1d107ffda26a6807acbb95e7dbf684d0 build(deps): :arrow_up: upgraded go to 1.22.5
  • a02cc378ca923931a419bfe068f055c02dc90a94 chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.22.5
  • d50df4b59c34d1764c20c260eee9db56b5944202 chore(deps): update module github.com/google/go-github/v62 to v63
  • 84c1d29a2ec3d589a9d5bb5353a312cde6af949e chore: :arrow_up: go-github upgraded to v63
  • 0d40f3978f10194d1aa5d98fccfac7830fbf043b chore: :truck: move version folder to pkg
  • 848b08b032d1a690f21b8232f454ce6e7fea746e chore: :truck: refactor func name
  • 55bb566c89ec66f30a8714f053fed6ff35405f3c feat: :sparkles: bitbucket support added
